entry.message: [info] Activation of plug-in XBRL rule processor (xule) successful, version Check version using Tools->Xule->Version on the GUI or --xule-version on the command line. - xule
[info] Activation of plug-in SEC Inline Transforms successful, version 19.2. - transforms/SEC
[info] Activation of plug-in Validate EFM successful, version 1.21.1. - validate/EFM
[info] Activation of plug-in Inline XBRL Document Set successful, version 1.1. - inlineXbrlDocumentSet

[DQR.IFRS.0080.8600] ifrs-full:ProceedsFromSaleOrIssueOfTreasuryShares has a value of -2,858,421,000 which is less than zero. This element should not have a negative value.
The properties of this ifrs-full:ProceedsFromSaleOrIssueOfTreasuryShares fact are: Period :2021-01-01 to 2021-12-31 Dimensions : Unit : ISK Rule version: 18.0.0RC1 - https://filings.xbrl.org/254900WR3I1Z9NPC7D84/2021-12-31/ESEF/IS/0/254900WR3I1Z9NPC7D84-2021-12-31-en.zip/254900WR3I1Z9NPC7D84-2021-12-31-en/reports/254900WR3I1Z9NPC7D84-2021-12-31-en.xhtml 13093

[DQR.IFRS.0105.9556] The following elements are in the presentation linkbase of [00000] - Statement - Income Statement but are not included in any calculation relationship in the filing. ifrs-full:ProfitLossAttributableToNoncontrollingInterests All elements appearing in the face of the financial statements should be included in a calculation relationship somewhere in the filing.
This rule will produce an error irrespective of a fact value being entered for the item(s) listed above.
Rule Element Id:9556 Rule version: 18.0.0RC1 -

[DQR.IFRS.0129.9626] It is expected that ComprehensiveIncomeAttributableToOwnersOfParent with a value of 10,649,762,000 reported in the network role http://kvika.is/role/ComprehensiveIncome should be equal to the dimensionally qualified concept, ComprehensiveIncome with the dimension ifrs-full:ComponentsOfEquityAxis = ifrs-full:EquityAttributableToOwnersOfParentMember and a reported value of 10,649,113,000 multiplied by 1. This value appears in the network role http://kvika.is/role/ChangesinEquity. This error occurs when the dimensionally qualified fact is not equal to the value input for the non dimensional item.
The properties of this ifrs-full:ComprehensiveIncomeAttributableToOwnersOfParent fact are:
Period : 2021-01-01 to 2021-12-31 Dimensions : Unit : ISK Decimals of ComprehensiveIncomeAttributableToOwnersOfParent : -3 Decimals of ComprehensiveIncome : -3 Rule version: 18.0.0RC1 - https://filings.xbrl.org/254900WR3I1Z9NPC7D84/2021-12-31/ESEF/IS/0/254900WR3I1Z9NPC7D84-2021-12-31-en.zip/254900WR3I1Z9NPC7D84-2021-12-31-en/reports/254900WR3I1Z9NPC7D84-2021-12-31-en.xhtml 13093

[DQR.IFRS.0129.9628] It is expected that ComprehensiveIncomeAttributableToNoncontrollingInterests with a value of -70,737,000 reported in the network role http://kvika.is/role/ComprehensiveIncome should be equal to the dimensionally qualified concept, ComprehensiveIncome with the dimension ifrs-full:ComponentsOfEquityAxis = ifrs-full:NoncontrollingInterestsMember and a reported value of -70,088,000 multiplied by 1. This value appears in the network role http://kvika.is/role/ChangesinEquity. This error occurs when the dimensionally qualified fact is not equal to the value input for the non dimensional item.
The properties of this ifrs-full:ComprehensiveIncomeAttributableToNoncontrollingInterests fact are:
Period : 2021-01-01 to 2021-12-31 Dimensions : Unit : ISK Decimals of ComprehensiveIncomeAttributableToNoncontrollingInterests : -3 Decimals of ComprehensiveIncome : -3 Rule version: 18.0.0RC1 - https://filings.xbrl.org/254900WR3I1Z9NPC7D84/2021-12-31/ESEF/IS/0/254900WR3I1Z9NPC7D84-2021-12-31-en.zip/254900WR3I1Z9NPC7D84-2021-12-31-en/reports/254900WR3I1Z9NPC7D84-2021-12-31-en.xhtml 13093
